edu.ub.prog2.utils

Interface InFileFolder


  • public interface InFileFolder
    Interface for guiding the implementation of file folders

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFile(java.io.File fitxer)
      Adds a new file to the folder
      void clear()
      Removes all the elements of the folder
      java.io.File getAt(int position)
      Obtains the file stored at a certain position
      int getSize()
      Gets the number of elements currently stored in the folder
      boolean isFull()
      Checks if the folder is at maximum capacity or not

      Removes a file from the folder

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Gets the number of elements currently stored in the folder
        Returns:
        Number of elements

             throws AppException
        Adds a new file to the folder
        Parameters:
        fitxer - Object to be added
        Throws:
        AppException

        void removeFile(java.io.File fitxer)
        Removes a file from the folder
        Parameters:

      • getAt

        java.io.File getAt(int position)
        Obtains the file stored at a certain position
        Parameters:
        position - Position in the folder
        Returns:
        Object in the given position or null if it does not exist

      • clear

        void clear()
        Removes all the elements of the folder

      • isFull

        boolean isFull()
        Checks if the folder is at maximum capacity or not
        Returns:
        True if there is no room for new items or false otherwise
